page.title: 11HOUSING
page.content: The housing found within the area of the grid is mainly owner occupied property. In both Rode Heath and Scholar Green there are few council houses to be found. In Rode Heath up until twelve years ago the only housing to be found used to straddle the A533 road to Sandbach or run alongside the canal.Alot of these houses were terraced and housed workers from the local salt mines or boat people.Since then a large housing estate has been built.The houses on the estate are mainly three bedroomed semi-detatched Dormer houses although there are some larger detatched houses and some bungalows.In Scholar Green the is a mixture of semi-detached, detached,bungalows and terraced housing.However of the two villages Rode Heath is by far the larger.
